description: This dataset provides a comprehensive analysis of the livability index for selected cities worldwide. It includes factors such as Movehub rating, purchase power, health care, pollution, quality of life, and crime rating.

data_columns.name: Movehub Rating
data_columns.description: Overall livability rating for the city according to Movehub.

data_columns.name: Quality of Life
data_columns.description: Livability score for overall quality of life.

source: CSV file containing livability index data for selected cities.
size: Variable (depends on the number of cities included)
accessibility: The data will be made freely available to the public.
reuse_conditions: The data can be reused and redistributed with proper attribution.
provenance: The data has been collected and curated for the purpose of city livability index analysis.
data_quality_assurance: Quality assurance processes have been implemented to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data.
